question.body: Choose which of the following would lead to edema.

multiple_choice.choice: increased leakiness of capillaries caused by inflammation
decreased blood pressure in the capillaries

response.feedback: Incorrect. This would increase BCOP and oppose the formation of edema.
Correct. This would cause protein to leak into the interstitial space, increasing IFCOP.
Incorrect. This would lower BHP, opposing edema.
